meanings.definition: Covered in or full of meshes
meanings.sent1: The fishing net was the meshiest I had ever seen.
meanings.sent2: The meshiest fabric is often used for making breathable clothing.
meanings.sent3: The spider created the meshiest web in the entire garden.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were a meshiest tangle, impossible to unravel.
meanings.sent5: The forest was so dense, it felt like walking through the meshiest maze.

meanings.sent1: The meshiest fence in the neighborhood was painted bright red.
meanings.sent2: The meshiest sieve allowed the finest particles to pass through.
meanings.sent3: The chef used the meshiest strainer to make the smoothest soup.
meanings.sent4: The net with the meshiest design caught the most fish.
meanings.sent5: The meshiest screen door kept out even the smallest insects.

meanings.sent1: Her hair was the meshiest after a day at the beach.
meanings.sent2: The vines in the jungle were the meshiest, making it hard to walk through.
meanings.sent3: The cords on his headphones always ended up in the meshiest knots.
meanings.sent4: The relationship between the two countries was the meshiest web of alliances.
meanings.sent5: The puzzle was the meshiest challenge, with pieces fitting together perfectly.
